Technique: FORMED BY HAND; UNSPECIFIED TECHNIQUE OF CERAMICS
Name: Crucible for the melting of  frit
Description: This object in terracotta comes from the excavations of W. F. Petrie at el-'Amarna. It'st a crucible for the melting of frit. The inside surface is covered with a thick coat of  blue coloured glaze; the upper edge is slightly blackened.
